creator: sullivan@mathcom.com
text:
keep-with-next and keep-with-previous do not work.
See the attached test file, which has several blocks
of text that use keep-with-next.
I tested on Fop-0.20.2RC-src.tar.gz running on RH 7.2 linux
on a pentium.  The output of the keep-with-next blocks
is split across pages.
